title: Clinical and Economic Burden of COPD in Patients on Inhaled Triple Therapy in Germany - A Retrospective Claims Data Analysis.
abstract: This study describes the pharmacological treatment as well as the clinical and economic burden of disease in chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) patients initiating triple therapy (TT) defined as a combination of a long-acting muscarinic antagonist (LAMA), a long-acting beta2-agonist (LABA) and an inhaled corticosteroid (ICS) in Germany.
journal: International journal of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease
